TITLE: Basic Usage Example of Bottom Sheet Stepper
DESCRIPTION: Complete example showing how to implement a two-step Bottom Sheet Stepper. Demonstrates creating step components, using the stepper ref to control presentation, and handling navigation between steps.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mahdidavoodi7/bottom-sheet-stepper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: tsx
CODE:
```
import React, { useRef } from "react";
import BottomSheetStepper, {
  BottomSheetStepperRef,
  StepComponentProps,
} from "bottom-sheet-stepper";

const Step1 = ({ onNextPress }: StepComponentProps) => (
  <View>
    <Text>Step 1</Text>
    <Button title="Next" onPress={onNextPress} />
  </View>
);

const Step2 = ({ onBackPress, onEnd }: StepComponentProps) => (
  <View>
    <Text>Step 2</Text>
    <Button title="Back" onPress={onBackPress} />
    <Button title="Finish" onPress={onEnd} />
  </View>
);

const App = () => {
  const stepperRef = useRef<BottomSheetStepperRef>(null);

  return (
    <>
      <Button
        title="Open Stepper"
        onPress={() => stepperRef.current?.present()}
      />

      <BottomSheetStepper ref={stepperRef} steps={[Step1, Step2]} />
    </>
  );
};
```

TITLE: Setting up Required Providers in React Native
DESCRIPTION: Code to set up the necessary providers for Bottom Sheet Stepper. Wraps the app with GestureHandlerRootView and BottomSheetModalProvider components.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mahdidavoodi7/bottom-sheet-stepper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: tsx
CODE:
```
import { GestureHandlerRootView } from "react-native-gesture-handler";
import { BottomSheetModalProvider } from "@gorhom/bottom-sheet";

<GestureHandlerRootView style={{ flex: 1 }}>
  <BottomSheetModalProvider>
    <App />
  </BottomSheetModalProvider>
</GestureHandlerRootView>;
```

TITLE: Using the Bottom Sheet Stepper Imperative API
DESCRIPTION: Example showing how to use the ref-based imperative API to control the Bottom Sheet Stepper externally. Demonstrates creating a ref and using the present and dismiss methods.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mahdidavoodi7/bottom-sheet-stepper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: ts
CODE:
```
const ref = useRef<BottomSheetStepperRef>(null);

ref.current?.present();
ref.current?.dismiss();
```

TITLE: Installing Bottom Sheet Stepper with npm/yarn
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the Bottom Sheet Stepper package using npm or yarn package managers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mahdidavoodi7/bottom-sheet-stepper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install bottom-sheet-stepper
# or
yarn add bottom-sheet-stepper
```

SOURCE: https://github.com/mahdidavoodi7/bottom-sheet-stepper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_1

TITLE: StepComponentProps Type Definition
DESCRIPTION: TypeScript type definition for the props passed to each step component in the Bottom Sheet Stepper. Includes navigation methods for moving between steps.
SOURCE: https://github.com/mahdidavoodi7/bottom-sheet-stepper/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-22_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: ts
CODE:
```
type StepComponentProps = {
  onNextPress: () => void;
  onBackPress: () => void;
  onEnd?: () => void;
};
```
